item.title: Obsidian Notes
item.description: Obsidian Notes What is Obsidian? In late 2022, I was lucky enough to stumble onto a wonderful project called Obsidian Notes. The principle is simple: a note-taking software composed of plain markdown files with a focus on interconnection and extensibility.

item.title: Beaver Works Summer Institute
item.description: Beaver Works Summer Institute Introduction In the summer of 2023, I had the pleasure of attending the Beaver Works Summer Institute, a program for rising high school seniors run by ...

item.title: Biking
item.description: Biking Research As winter settled in and I began to spend more time inside, I was looking to get into a new excerise hobby. I spent a while thinking about it, and eventually decided that I wanted to start biking.

item.title: Hello, World
item.description: Hello, World Hey there! I am Eben Quenneville, a Physics student at the University of New Hampshire. This is a publicly accessible sub-section of my personal notes network built using Obsidian.

item.title: Silvis
item.description: Silvis Introduction After building Tantalus and another Dactyl Manuform 5x6, I still wasn’t fully satisfied with my secondary keyboard. My Dactyl Manuform R-Track is perfect for my primary setup, but I have been moving around more and doing school work on a laptop.

item.title: Icarus
item.description: Icarus Introduction I had just finished a written math assignment when I thought to myself: why should I have to compute something on my calculator, then enter it into the computer? ...

item.title: Tantalus
item.description: Tantalus Introduction This is my 3rd ergonomic keyboard, and my first completely custom design. My previous build, the Dactyl Manuform R-Track, was almost perfect.

item.title: Dactyl Manuform R-Track
item.description: Dactyl Manuform R-Track Preface: This design is entirely made by QQurn, and details can be found at gitlab.com/keyboards1/dm_r_track. After building my first ergonomic keyboard a few months prior, I wanted to do more electronics.

item.title: ErgoTravel
item.description: ErgoTravel The ErgoTravel was my first foray into the world of Ergonomic Keyboards. For this first build, I stuck with something tried and true. I purchased a kit from an online retailer, and built it according to the instructions.
